## Download and install RStudio 

::: panel-tabset

### SDU

Install RStudio via SDU ITs Software Center.

### Others

You will find the RStudio installation program for your operating system on [RStudios website](https://www.rstudio.com/products/rstudio/download/)

#### Step 1

There are four different programs, that you can download for your computer -- make sure, yoiu download the one entitled **RStudio Desktop Open Source License Free**. Click the blue 'DOWNLOAD' button.

Follow the download link to the [RStudio download website](https://posit.co/download/rstudio-desktop/):

#### Step 2

You will now be presented with several download options -- make sure you choose the download appropriate for your operating system (click the blue text link in the column 'Download').

Illustration of download links from [RStudios website](https://www.rstudio.com/products/rstudio/download/):

![This is an illustration and not an active download link -- follow the link provided above to download.](gfx/download_rstudio_choose_installer.png)

:::{.callout-important}
## Important

Choose the right link in the column now Download: Windows, MacOS or your Linux distribution.
:::

Install the program as per usual procedure for your operating system.

:::

Once you have installed RStudio, check that it is functional as expected:

::: panel-tabset
## Windows

Click the Start menu button, look for RStudio and click to confirm, that RStudio is installed.
